sqlMap.statement:
SELECT MDS.IMG_SPLY_YIELD_CNT AS IMG_SPLY_YIELD_CNT ,MDS.IMG_SPLY_TP_CD FROM ORD_TAKE_MDSE OTM ,MDSE MDS
WHERE OTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND OTM.ORD_TAKE_MDSE_CD = #ordTakeMdseCd# AND OTM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MDS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OTM.MDSE_CD = MDS.MDSE_CD AND MDS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
